head.supplied: Melbourne bot Garden ¶ 21/8/68. ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to solicit, that you will be pleased to sanction the issue of a small volume as a garden-guide. A publication of this kind would serve much ...

div.p: Q68/11537, unit 750, VPRS 44/P inward registered and unregistered correspondence, VA 538 Department of Crown Lands and Survey, Public Record Office, Victoria.
MS annotation by J. M. Grant: 'Appd' [Approved]. However, the work appears not to have been published. Melbourne bot Garden

21/8/68.
For reply, see C. Hodgkinson to M, 28 August 1868.

I have the honor to solicit, that you will be pleased to sanction the issue of a small volume as a garden-guide. A publication of this kind would serve much the purposes of useful information, and could be issued by a private publisher, who would find the sale of such a book remunerative. I for my own part desire no pecuniary advantage from such a publication.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,

div.p: The hon J. M. Grant, M.P.

Pres. of the Board of Land & Works.
See also M to J. Hooker, 10 September 1868.
